overview: Preston brings over two decades of executive-level, early stage company experience to SimpleSignal. As an entrepreneur in both the healthcare services and high technology sectors, he co-founded two companies, serving as president and CEO. As a key executive in these organizations, he spearheaded the raising of private capital, leading to the successful public offering of one of his companies, QualMark Corporation. One year following the IPO, QualMark was named by Deloitte Touche as one of the twenty five fastest growing technology companies based in Colorado.
